ygData.subject: RE: Rathe Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings and Welcome! You can go to www.onelist.com   and read it in the daily archives.  By now, you may know form the context of the
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings and Welcome!

You can go to www.onelist.com <http://www.onelist.com> and read it in the
daily archives. By now, you may know form the context of the other replies,
the tip was kill everything (all the low level trash mobs too) to make more
hill giants spawn on the hill giant plateau in the Rathe Mts. They are
using the charm song to make hill giants kill each other.

Sylly Songsynger
<Spirit of the Moon>
Bard of the 34th song
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: Crysarra de'Danaan [mailto:lucretia_71@...]
Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 8:13 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Rathe Mountains

From: Crysarra de'Danaan <lucretia_71@...>


hello all
I am new to the list (like the last few days)...and
unfortunately I
think I missed this message that he is referring to saying
thanks for
the tip. would someone be so kind as to repeat it or even
send it to
me privately? I would be most interested as I love to fight
in the
Rathe mountains but I have yet to ever make that kind of
money....what
are you doing? As well I should point out that I am a druid
but I just
started a bard and I love her. she just made level 6 and I
think that
the best thing about being a bard is having something to
look forward
to at each level instead of every 5 like most classes. I
thank you all
for your indulgence.

Crysarra Windblade
Chisarra de'Danaan

--- kim@... wrote:
> Wow, thanks for the tip on clearing the "trash" mobs from
the
> hills here to get giants to spawn. I made over 350pp
there
> tonight, and each of my friends there made over 200pp (I
was
> soloing a couple hours before the others showed up). I
think
> my guild raked in close to 2000pp for the night, as well
as 8
